text:
I was looking for another dark/bold coffee. From the description, Fuhgeddaboutit sounded like it would be a nice change from previous purchases of Jet Fuel, Fog Chaser, and Black Tiger - all of which are terrific coffees. Very disappointed because this was neither dark or bold. I shared some of the k-cups with coworkers to get their opinion and the most positive response was that it tasted "funky", at least more positive than "tastes like paper".

Sorry, this one didn't cut it...
